feed.title: Nihar Gupta Chinta
feed.subtitle: I am a DevOps Engineer at [SLB](https://www.slb.com//) where I build and maintain the infrastructure for the company. I enjoy exploring new technologies and building products that bring my ideas to life. I received my Master's degree in Computer Science from the [University of Massachusetts Amherst](https://www.umass.edu/) in 2024.
